reviewText:
Now I do not want in anyway possible to give out the idea. That I am disrespecting the Honored Dead of the Memorial in amy way possible. As I think that the idea and the memorial is just fantastic. But the film about it was not up to Mr. Snow's usual high standards.
  As he could of told us briefly. What fights were involved that caused the death of the persons honored by this memorial. Like for example. The combats in Palestine, Malaysian Emergency, Suez, Mau Mau, Falklands etc etc. As these folks deserve better than this film.
